p: In terms of stability, the chemical elements contained in the M. officinalis leaves can be arranged as follows: K > Na > La > Ca > Zn > Fe > Sm > Br > Rb > As > Cs > Sb > Sc > Ba > Co > Ce > Th > Cr. The most variable element in the M.officinalis turned out to be chromium and the most stable was potassium ( Table 3).
